name: In the Rift's Depths
description: This (Alpha) game is based on exploration and submarine driving. You can dive between the ocean's mountains and lurk with the most abominable creatures, just you and your fear in your darwen Bathyclaste. There is no time for sleep : Fill the ballast, charge torpedoes from the engine room, listen to the hydrophone and don't forget to launch some sonar pings to be sure you're not going strait on a rock.
